name: Which toilet is best?
text: Wall-Hung or One-Piece: A wall hung toilet is simply a toilet that is attached to the wall instead of the floor. The toilet's cistern is hidden behind it, as part of the wall. Because of this, the toilet's flusher is often a panel on said wall, rather than a button on the cistern. A one-piece toilet features the tank and bowl as a single, integrated unit, creating a sleek, easy-to-clean design, often with a lower profile than two-piece toilets.
